title: Family Guy The Quest for Stuff v1.4.1 (MOD) Android

Overview: After another epic battle with the giant chicken, Peter Griffin has accidentally destroyed Quahog!

What's New 
It's Halloween in Quahog! The pumpkins are being carved, the candy bowls are being filled, and all the slutty costumes are selling out. But something seems a little spooky and strange... Quahog's being haunted by ghosts!
Help Peter Griffin and his Ghostbusting buddies defeat scary ghouls! Vanquishing ghosts give you Spirit Vials: a powerful liquid used for buying event items and for crafting!

Instruction(s):
- Make Sure Your Account Is Already Updated To v1.4.1
- Then Uninstall Any Version You Have
- Download the Mod
- Install and Enjoy!
